### About this site

This site is made in RMarkdown using three essential components: index.html, _site.yml, and about.html. It is hosted remotely on Github; the source code can be found at this [repo directory](https://github.com/Catherinefzq/ds100.github.io.git).
The Rstudio Version used to make this project is 3.5.1. The packages used are *tidyverse(v1.2.1)*, *patchwork*, *plotly*, *viridis*, and *flexdashboard* to load the template for our dashboard.
